Summary: sitting on my bed looking out window where a tree once was a blue and white or two tone blue object went from left to right , flashing like a strobe light so fast it was like it was always on. was doing a 20 degree decent 3 miles a way at 1500 mile hr
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kitchener
There was one other sighting in Kitchener on or around February 6th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsa blue strobe light flashing so fast it was like it was always on , traveled left to right over kitchener toward cambridge kind of like a flight path over the golf course and if i was to get of the landing spot based on the degree of decent, i would say blair rd. or st-george st near the grand river. once it left my sight i waiting to hear a explosion or a boom even a flash from impact but nothing it was gone. just 8 seconds of a passing light. so if it didn't crash then it landed would be my conclution, but it was out of my sight. i seen it for 8 seconds . the object had to be 3 or 4 miles away and the size was about the size of a large home , the shape was square with no sharp corners, kind of like a work truck's yellow flashing lights you see around on pick-ups. but the colouring was dark blue then light blue bands from top to bottom, strobing real fast. with a small glow or was it a blur, not sure . the sky was clear and it was morning twilight. i have seen the air balloons in kitchener , and this was not one of them. and not that early in the am. the size of the air balloon at the same distance may be a 1\4 , of what i seen. i got a clear eye full and have felt weird about it all day. has someone else told me the story or i read it from here lets say. i could not believe it. however i have seen something not local.
